    • paint

      public void paint​(Graphics g, int x, int y, Color draw_color, Color fill_color)
      Description copied from interface: PointIcon
      Paints a point at the given location with the given colors. (Does not change the drawing color of the graphics context.)
      Specified by:
      paint in interface PointIcon
      Parameters:
      g - graphics context
      x - X coordinate of the center.
      y - Y coordinate of the center.
      draw_color - Color used for the outline: if null, then no outline.
      fill_color - Color used for the inside: if null, then no filling.

    • paintIcon

      public void paintIcon​(Component C, Graphics g, int x, int y)
      Paints this DiamondIcon. Drawing and filling colors are determined by the values set for this PointDisplay - if none, then defaults are taken from C.
      Specified by:
      paintIcon in interface Icon
      Parameters:
      C - a non-null component
      g - graphics context
      x - X coordinate for upper left corner of icon.
      y - Y coordinate for upper left corner of icon.

    • paint

      public void paint​(Graphics g, int x, int y)
      Description copied from interface: PointIcon
      Paints a point at the given location with the given colors. Drawing and filling colors are determined by the values set for this style - if none, then defaults are taken from the graphics context.
      Specified by:
      paint in interface PointIcon
      Parameters:
      g - graphics context
      x - X coordinate of the center.
      y - Y coordinate of the center.

    • setSize

      public void setSize​(int point_size)
      Sets a 45-degree rotated square with area 2*point_size*point_size.
      Specified by:
      setSize in interface PointIcon
      Parameters:
      point_size - radius of the circle in which this guy has to fit.
